00017 #include "MisrMapQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 
00032 MTKt_status MtkSomXYToLS(
00033   MTKt_MapInfo mapinfo, 
00034   double som_x,         
00035   double som_y,         
00036   float *line,          
00037   float *sample          )
00038 {
00039   MTKt_status status_code;  /* Return status of this function */
00040 
00041   if (line == NULL || sample == NULL)
00042     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00043 
00044   /* Determine line/sample from ulc som x/y and resolution */
00045   *line = (float)((som_x - mapinfo.som.ulc.x) / mapinfo.resolution);
00046   *sample = (float)((som_y - mapinfo.som.ulc.y) / mapinfo.resolution);
00047 
00048   /* Check line/sample bounds */
00049   if (*line < -0.5 || *line > mapinfo.nline - 0.5)
00050     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00051   if (*sample < -0.5 || *sample > mapinfo.nsample - 0.5)
00052     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00053 
00054   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00055 ERROR_HANDLE:
00056   if (status_code != MTK_NULLPTR)
00057   {
00058     *line = -1.0;
00059     *sample = -1.0;
00060   }
00061   return status_code;
00062 }
